gov.fnal.ppd.dd.signage

Interface Display

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayAsConnectionToFireFox, DisplayAsJFrame, DisplayAsStandaloneBrowser, DisplayControllerAbstract, DisplayControllerMessagingAbstract, DisplayFacade, DisplayImpl, DynamicDisplayWithoutJxBrowser

    public interface Display
extends java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The signature of a Dynamic Display in the Fermilab Dynamic Display System
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation
